pages.text: The reaper has nothing on you when you're using the $(item)Death Protection Poppet$().$(br2)Much like a $(item)Totem of Undying$(), this poppet will pull you from the edge of death once.
$(item)Death Protection Poppets$() do not work in $(l:bewitchment:tools/poppet_shelves)Poppet Shelves$().
